mapper.insert: insert into person ( person_id, personname, person_age, person_sex, person_birthday) values ( #{personId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personAge, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{personSex, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personBirthday, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select person_password as password from person where person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: person_id "personId", person_name "personName", person_age "personAge", person_sex "personSex", person_birthday "personBirthday", createtime "createTime"
